mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board INNER JOIN user ON board.writerId = user.id ORDER BY board.id DESC LIMIT ${start}, ${size}
SELECT * FROM board INNER JOIN user ON board.writerId = user.id WHERE board.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, writerId, entry_date, modify_date) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE title LIKE concat("%", #{keyword}, "%") OR content LIKE concat("%", #{keyword}, "%")
